div.p:
Curia legalis balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xxj die maij anno quo supra

Eodem die thomas mar legittime vocatus respondere plegio super ipsum per alexandrum
mathesone porrecto pro releuacione ipsius de summa octodecim li' et cetera non comparuit
Ideo precipitur philippo Dunbrek seriando ad capiendum districtum a dicto thoma
et premunire eum Idem eundem ad plegium dimitti et ipsum premunire
hodie ad quindenam tanquam secundo die huius processus

Eodem die Andreas lousone in amerciamento Curie per assisam Juratam pro perturbio
Jacobi crak et sponse sue quibus emendabit ut Jura voluit et Idem
andreas reddet dimidium petre cere ad legittime misse Sancti Sanguinis et cetera
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiiij die maij anno quo supra

the said' day it was deliuerit be ane assis' Jonhne moir' forspekar
that the hous' of Jonhne Kintor that conny menyeis Inhabit was
nocht sufficient Ande thai ordanit thir said Jhon' to recompens' hir the skath
that scho hes sustenit tharthrow say mekile as scho can preyf hir skathtit
tharintill in his defalt

Eodem die Johannes Kintor fecit constituit creauit et ordinauit thomam
prat suum legittimum procuratorem ad prosequendum agnetem menyes pro firma domus
sue ac in omnibus aliis actionibus ipsum concernentibus Promitten' de Rato
et grato cum omnibus clausulis necessariis et oportunis et cetera
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xxviij die maij anno quo supra

Eodem die Andreas litstar fatebatur se debens Johanni thomsone quatuor
s' et nouem d' monete scocie de bonis quondam thome litstar et suarum prolium
quam summam Duncanus straloche seriandus de mandato prepositi et balliuorum
ordauit ordinauit dictum Andream per tactum virge suj officij ad soluendum infra terminum Juris
et Inde dictus Johannes peciit Instrumentum Testibus preposito Andrea Culan Johanne menyeis
Roberto Crage Andrea Waus dominis Andrea chamer et Johanne litstar capellanis

the samyn day it was sufficiently preuit that thar was j f' of gret salt
resauit be the commavnd' of the lard of many fra Androw Waus and disponit
in his vys' and salit xxxvc fische to his avne profite

The saide day philp Dunbrek seriande at commavnde of the aldirman and
balyeis chargit Androu Waus be his wand to remane within the
tolbutht quhilk he content and pait to gilbert Waus of many vij
markis restand' of ane gretar Some and the restis of his hous'
maile eftir the tenor' of the akis maid' obefor

The saide day the ballieis assignit friday that next cumis to Androw
litstar to ansuer' to the borghe strekit one him be Jonhne thomsone
for the wranguis' haldin fra him of iij li' and vj s' to Compt and rek
ning perempturly with consent of batht the said partiis gif thai accorde
nocht in the tyme
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxix die maij anno quo supra

The saide day the aldirman and ballieis assignit monunday next eftir
the trinite day to thomas mar to ansuer to the borghe' strekit
apone him be Jonhne Colisone for the wranguis' haldin fra him of
sex li' gretis squair' money of the rest of ane gret' some for j quartar
of Schip callit the barbora et cetera
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio primo Junij anno quo supra

the samyn day thomas quhit resignit in the handis of Jonhne menyeis
bailye his lande liande within the said burghe and his gudis to the pament
of fifty s' acht to patrik bethe togiddir with the costis that he cane
preywe that he has maide herintill in the said thomas defalt to be
pait at lammes next to Cum but fraude or gile witnes sere Jhon'
ruthirfurd Alexander chamer the fadir Robert blinsele Alexander chamer yongar thomas
Waus and philp Dunbrek seriand'

The saide day it was Statute and ordanit be the aldirman and consale
for the cessinge of the trubule controuersy and debate betuix lindesay herrald'
and Williame coupar anent properteis of myris clamyt be thame of
the commone gronde of this burghe' that the saidez personis leid avay
the fevale that thai haue castyne this sesone and neuir ane of tham
cast in that myris in tyme to Cum becaus' that nayne of thar'
commonite suld' be turnit nor haldin propirte be ony persone
In tyme to Cum Ande thai and al vthiris merk thar myris in dew
tyme yerlie and cast tharintill as vys' and wont has bene tymes bigan

the saide day the actione debatabile betuix Alexander liale one that ane
parte and magis the relict of vmquhile Alexander stokar one that vthir parte for the
vphaldinge of ane lande liand' within the said' burghe' quhilkis
scho clamis in coniunctfeftment is continevit quhile monunday that next
cumis that the aldirman caus' the consale be gathreit to decid' herintile

The saide day Alexander liall saide he hede nay thinge to obiect
and agan say the coniunctfeftment that magis the relict of Alexander
stokar hes of ane land' liand' within the saide burghe in the
vuirkirkgate

the saide day Alexander liall schew ane letter of Sesin gevin to
him of ane lande liande in the vuirkirkgat that was Alexander stokaris
vndir the Sele of Alexander chamer bailye for that tyme quhilkis
was rede In Jugement et cetera

Curia legalis balliuorum tenta in pretorio quarto die Junij anno
quo supra

add.foreign: Statutum pro conseruacione terrarum datarum in coniuncte infeodacione mulieribus

div.p:
the samyn day it was Statut' and ordanit be the consale aldirman balye
is consale and communite that ale woman hawand landis within this
burghe' in coniunctfeftment sale vphald the samyn deuly in ale
thingis as efferis Induringe the tyme of hir coniunctfeftmente
and mak thame als' gude and vphald thame deuly in ale thingis
concerning' thame as the tyme that scho entiris tharwith eftir hir husbandis deces'
as in ane ak maid in the chavmerlane court be the gret assis' matir
fullely is contenit

the samyn day it was ordanit and deliuerit be the aldirman balyeis
consal and communite present for the tyme that magis the relict of Alexander
Stokar sal reforme and vphald the hald and bigyne that scho has in
coniunctfeftment liand' in the vuirkirkgate and mak it als' gude as
it was the tyme of the deces' of hir husbande within ane yer'
and ane day hereftir

Eodem die thomas mar legittime vocatus ad respondendum plegio porrecto
super ipsum per Alexandrum mathesone pro iniusta detencione in releuacione
ipsius de summa xviij li' non comparuit Ideo precipitur philippo Dunbrek
seriando ad capiendum districtum a dicto thoma et eundum ad plegium dimitti
si petatur et premunire ipsum ad proximam Curiam car legalem tanquam
3o die huius processus

Eodem die Willelmus blinsele deuenit plegius legalis pro Andrea branche
quod Johanne malisone erit Indempnis pro eo aliter quam per viam Juris et thomas
Prat deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus andreas erit Indempnis pro eo aliter
quam per viam iuris et vtque pars alter obligatur per manum ad conseruandum plegium
Indempnes de huiusmodi fideiussione

the samyn day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' thomas prat
forspekar that Androw branche sal cum befor the aldirman and ballieis within
the tolbutht betuix this day xv dais or this day xv dais
and mak gud fatht be the gret aithe that he he maide nay finance
with Jonhne malisone and tuk nay Siluer fra him her' for finance nor
borrouit nay siluer fra him nor promittit nor acht him nayne and
gif he deponis this aithe be the said day he is quyt of the xvi s' g' and viij g'
follouit be Jonhne malisone and the borghe follouit strekit apone
the said' Androw is nayne of waile Ande gif the said Androw
falleis in the saide aitht than he sal pay the said xvj s' g' and viij g'
and the borghe strekit one him salbe of waile

Eodem die Dauid Kintor legittime vocatus ad respondendum plegio super ipsum per
thomam quhit porrecto pro iniusta detencione ab eo summe iiij li'
non comparuit Igitur thome Jamesone ad capiendum districtum a dicto
Dauid et eundem ad plegium dimitti si petatur et ipsum premunire ad proximam
Curiam legalem tanquam quarto die huius processus
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio octauo die Junij anno quo supra

Eodem die Dauid menyes senior creauit constituit et ordinauit dominum Johannem
ruthirfurd Johannem Colisone et Willelmum nicholson coniunctim et divisim suos procuratores
legittimos ad petendum recipiendum omnia et singula bona sibi debit' et Inde
quieteclamand' Ac in omnibus aliis et singulis actionibus ipsum concernentibus
ad prosequendum et defendendum promitten' de Rato et grato cum omnibus
terminis ad procuratorium necessariis et oportunis et cetera

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem curie quod elena thomson'
et Agnes thomsone filie quondam Walteri thomsone burgensis huius
burgi fuerunt legittime etatis ad recipiendum bona sua et inde
quieteclamand' et notant' a thoma prat duo serplaria lane et
thoma prat acquitan' legittimas exihibend' cum pacto de ulterius non
peten'

The samyn day Walter atkin schew that alexander rede hed certan lettres
and chartiris in his kepin concerning his wyffis heretage quharfor he
protestit that he suld' nocht part with the saidis evidentis to nay man but
his avys' and gif he did that it sulde nocht turne him to nay preiudice
the saide day the aldirman and

Eodem die Alexander mar' fecit constituit et ordanit ordinavit Johannem colisone suum legittimum
procuratorem ad in causa debatabili inter ipsum et thomam rollande penes processum
cuiusdam terre Jacentis in vico fucarum furcarum ad prosequendum agendum et defendendum
in vberiore forma procuratorij P Promitten' de Rato et grato et cetera
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xiiij die Junij anno quo supra

the saide day Jonhne gray grige was fundin decretit and ordanit
be the consale present for the tyme to content and pay to Jonhne Stronoche
xij s' Scottis money for Ilkan of the fiwe rinsche guthtlingis opte
nit apon him for William scherar' eftir the tenour of the akis abefor'
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xviij die Junij Anno quo supra

the samyn day Jonhne malisone oblist him be the fatht of his bodie
to content and pay to thome Dauisone xxvij s' Scottis money be lammes
day next to cum of the rest of ane barrel of Salmonde

Eodem die thomas rollande fecit constituit creauit et ordinauit magistrum Alexandrum
fyf suum legittimum procuratorem in causa debatabili inter ipsum ex vna et Alexandrum mar
partibus ex altera penes processum cuiusdam terre Jacentis in vico furcarum promitten'
de Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij et cetera

Eodem die actio debatabilis inter thomas rolland' et Alexandrum mar' penes
processum cuiusdam terre Jacentis in vico furcarum continuatur cum consensu parcium
vsque ad vicesimum diem legittimum proximum futurum sub spe concorde absque preiudicie parcium

the samyn day thomas mar' was lauchfullie callit and nocht comperit to ansuer'
ato the borghe' strekit apone him be Jonhne colison for the wranguis'
haldin fra him of sex li' g' squair' money tharfor the ballieis chargit
philp Dunbrek officiar' to pas' and tak ane distres' of the said thomas
and lat it to borghe agan gyf it be askit and warne him to this day
xv dais to ansuer' to the saide borghe as the secunde day of proces' gif
it be lauchfule and falyeinge tharof the next lauchful day thareftir folloinge

the samyn day thomas mar' was lauchfully callit and nocht comperit to ansuer
to the borghe strekit apone him be Alexander mathesone for the wranguislie
haldin fra him of xviij li' to the frething' of his lande at the handis of mariory
and margaret colp and tharfor the ballieis chargit philp Dunbrek officiare
to pas' and tak ane distres' of the said thomas and latt it to borghe'
gif it be askit And warne him to this day xv dais to ansuer to
the said borghe as the ferd day of process' gif it be lauchfule and
falyeing tharof to the next lauchful day thareftir follouing

the said day comperit Elizibeth' chamer and producit ane testimoniale vndir the
Sele of Jonhne culane of ane lande liande in the vuirkirkgate
that scho was in Sesin of for ale the dais of hir lywe and askit to be
obeit tharintill as efferis And' the aldirman and ballieis ordanit philp
Dunbrek officiar' to pas' and charge the tennentis of the I said lande
to obey the said Elizibeth' eftir the tenor' of the said testimoniale of Sesin
for ony richt that thai hed seyne in the contrar'

the saide day comperit Dauid Kintor with William blinsel his forspekar
and fand ane borghe in the handis of philp Dunbrek that he was quyt
of the clame of thomas quhit vnto the tyme he be follouit be new soyt
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xxv die Junij anno quo supra

The said day Jonhne glenmaluyn follouit gilbert muresone for xij s'
and vj d' of annuell acht him of fiwe termes bigan and the saide
gilbert allegit it is bot x s' for iiij yeris and gaf it him in his aithe
to sueir' it was xij s' and vj d' and he sulde pay him the saide siluer
quhilk aithe the saide Jonhne suer' in Jugement

the saide day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Dauid mar'
forspekar that gif Jonhne portar and his wyf cumis befor the aldirman and
ballieis betuix this and this day viij dais and makis gud fatht
that richerd bernys the saide Jhone gat nocht the bill agan that
he hed deliuerit to richerde bernis anent x s' g' he is quyt
of the said x s' g' follouit be the said richerd and falyeing' thai
depone nocht the said Jonhne sal pay the said x s' g'

The samyn day Richerd bernis protestit solemptlie that quhat the
saide assis' has done and deliuerit anent the said x s' g' clamyt
be him apon Jhone portar turne him to nay preiudice nay he
may haue remede of law

The said day thomas Waus grantit him avand to James Colison'
xxviij s' and ij d' of maile iij s' one ane evill lew and ane
lang sadill the quhilk xx d' and iij s' and langsadile the balyeis chargit
him to pay in continent and to pay the xxviij s' and ij d' within terme of law
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xxvjo die Junij anno quo supra

the samyn day comperit Jonhne portar and his wyf befor the aldirman
and ballieis and deponit the aithe that the saide Jonhne gat neuir the bile
agan anent the x s' g' that he deliuerit to richerd bernis eftir the tenor'
of the deliuerance of ane assis' given and deliuerit tharupone obefore

the said day Wille buchane grantit him to pay xij s' of ane
butht maile to sere robert leis of this last yer' bigan quhen he
deliueris him the schryene beinge within the said butht

the saide day Androw branche grantit he was apone the gate
quhene the laddis was castande stanys

The said day it was Statutit and ordanit be the consale present
for the tyme that gif euire William lammyntone or any vthiris wakis
In the nicht and committis ony iniuris stribulance or Inquietis
any person or personis or the tone' sal pay fiwe merkis to sanct
nicholes' werk and vthir fiwe merkis to the reforming' of the tolbutht
Ande gif thair haue nay gudis thai sale be putt in the goyff
and thar remane iij or iiijor dais the first tyme and say the
secunde tyme and the thrid tyme thai salbe banyst the tone'

the saide day Richerd bernis grantit him awand viij s'
to Jonhne portar to be pait within terme of law
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xxviij die Junij anno quo supra

Eodem die Willelmus abirdour' assignavit mariorie menyeis sponse
sue totam piscariam suam tercie parte rethis de pott super aquam de
Dee pro omnibus terminis suis Testibus Johanne culan preposito Johanne menyes
Waltero auchneywe Willelmo andirsone senior thoma Waus
gilberto menyeis Andrea murray Juniore philippo Dunbrek et Johanne
Williamsone Judicatore

The said day Katrine buchane tuk to preif one tuysday that next
cumis that the schrine pertening to androw ancroft beinge in ane butht
of Sanct Sebestianis lande is hirris

The said' day it was deliuerit be a sworne assis' David mar forspek
ar that cristeane lilburne sall cum in presens of the aldirman bailyeis of
the hail court and on' hir kneis ask sere Johne' of streweling
forgifnes for the strublance of him wndir silence of nycht and
opinly glaumerand' him saiand' scho suld' ger banys' the said'
sere John' out of this toune / quhilk the said' sere John' wald' nocht haf
sustenit for jc cronis' / and' atour for part of assithtment of the
said' blasfemyng the said' cristeane sall cum on' sonday next
to the hie altar in sanct nicholes kirk and peroffer j li' of wax
in hir hand' to the said' sere John' at hie mestim in presens
of the hail pepill / at the will of the said' sere John' / and'
atour gif the said' cristean beis convictit In' tim to cum for
strublance of the said' sere John' or of ony othiris famws' perso
nis the said' cristean' sall pay to sant nycholes wark fif mercis x mercis
at the will of the aldirman and the consal of the toune and of the
party the said' x mercis wnforgiffin togider with an' sufficient
amendis till the party

the saide day Jonet Abirdour and William Abirdour deliuerit to Jonhne Culan aldir
man in kepinge four chartiris and j letter of Sesin of the lande of
vmquhil richerd culannis liande in the gallowgate / ane chartir
of a rige liande at the crabstane ane reuersione of xij s' of annuell
a chartir of ij ald yardis in futy and j letter of Sesin in paper of henrik
vocatis quhilkis he sal keipe and part nocht with tham but the avys'
of vij personis of the nerrast of batht the sidis and greis of
blude one fadir side and mothir Syde
